lines.text: I LOVE Americans. You all have a good taste.
[the undead Amy rises from a slab as a zombie]
Thanks for the lovely evening, douche-bag. You really know how to treat a lady!
No! You're dead!
No, I'm undead. Which means I'm forced to walk this wretched earth until you die.
[Brad appears as a zombie]
Not so fast! You want my buddy dead, you're gonna have to come through me.
Oh, that's something.
[to Andy]
It took me four years on a stairmaster to get a package like this. You ripped through it like a lamb chop!
This can't be happening.
Don't blame me Andy. I warned you.

[to Andy]
Wait a minute. You knew about this all along?
Hey, keep it quiet! Some of us are trying to rest in pieces here.
So hey you guy's are werewolve's too huh, super glad to know you
Andy, i don't think you have accepted the gift that has been given to you or much less appreciated it.

We have a mission Andy, to purify the world that why we pick our victim's through the scul of society, the government's of the world spend billions on medicine, welfare, charity to what affect it only keeps alive the weak the stupid the lazy who breed and multiply and weaking the human race.
All my men I have chosen for their loyalty their dedication to the coming age

but you, you were not to have been, you're an accident, an anomaly, I do not wish to kill you, I pray you will join is in our rise to become the new mankind. Pure free of disease free from the trappings of technological advance, will you join us... Andy?
I don't know... you know that's a big decision, I'm gonna need some time to think about that.
Sure.
I want you to blow a big bubble for me.
What?
Well... It's a custom in France. The bigger the bubble, the more a boy likes a girl.
Did you see a girl? She's stolen my heart.
I know the feeling.
Great. Come to Paris and check out les drains.
I didn't choose to become a werewolf. I can't face the fact that I've got to go around killing and eating people for the rest of my life.
Better get used to it.
Who do you have to sleep with to get a guy to have sex with you?

[outside the Club Luna]
Claude said no one is to be admitted once the door was locked.
The full moon is rising; would you rather I remained out here with you?
Uh, no.
[opens the door and lets Serafine in, quickly locking the door behind her]
I'm losing... my freaking... skull!

[Wakes up naked and surrounded by a crowd the morning after his first rampage as a werewolf]
What did I do?
Are you her, uh, brother?
Let's just say I... look after her.

[undead]
thank's for the lovely evening, douche bag! You really know how to show a girl a good time don't you!
No,no,no you're dead!
No, I ain't so lucky I am undead and as your rotting sidekick I am cursed to remain a restless spirit until you die!
Not so fast., you want my buddy dead nutball you're gonna have to wait I need him first he's no use to me as a corpse
I waited Four year's on a stairmaster to get a package like this, you ripped through it like a lamb chop.
Don't blame me Andy I warned you.

[to Andy]
wait you mean you knew this all along
[punches Andy her hand phase's through his mouth]

[banging his head against the wall]
im losing... my... freaking skull!
Come on you gotta pull yourself together Andy, you gotta get outta here the cop's wanna put you away for life.
Sorry we are full.
This building is closed
[show's badge]
who gave you a permit for this party?
Ask the boss inside.
[let's them in]

[drunkenly to Andy]
Are you kidding me, I love Jim Morrison.
